title: Belgian model and her boyfriend are bashed and kidnapped in Brisbane in suspected targeted attack
text:
A Belgian model and her boyfriend - who were gagged and abducted in Brisbane - were specifically targeted, according to police.

Caroll Dufailly, 39, and Eduardus Groenewegen, 55, were assaulted by an unknown number of people in their home in the Ipswich suburb of Raceview early Saturday morning.

The kidnappers held the couple against their will before driving them to the nearby suburb of Ripley, and dumping them on the side of the road.

A Belgian model and her boyfriend were gagged and abducted in Brisbane, as police say the savage attack was targeted and not random

Mr Groenewegen is now in intensive care with serious head injuries, but is expected to survive.

Ms Dufailly was so shaken by the ordeal that she hasn't been able to provide police with 'overly helpful' information.

The kidnappers held the couple against their will before driving them to the nearby suburb of Ripley, and dumping them on the side of the road

'At this point in time, we believe these two people were targeted for a reason that we're still trying to establish,' Detective Senior Sergeant David Briese told 7 News on Monday.

'We're investigating a number of angles, based on their business and who they are.

But Det Snr Sgt Briese said it was proving difficult to establish a list of suspects while the couple are still recovering in hospital and unable to provide information.

The couple runs events company Benassi Event Solutions, which specialises in festivals, dance events and motorsport.

Police wouldn't speculate on whether drugs were a factor in the incident.

But Det Snr Sgt Briese said it's a 'surety' that the couple knew their kidnappers.
description: Caroll Dufailly, 39, and Eduardus Groenewegen, 55, were assaulted by an unknown number of people in their home in the Ipswich suburb of Raceview early Saturday morning.
authors: Alana Mazzoni For Daily Mail Australia
